author: amaltaro
body:
@todor-ivanov here is the change that works out of the box for me (well, I can build and upload RPMs).
Note that I haven't made any changes to the curl.spec file. I tried to update curl to the same version used in the CMSSW branch, but I get failures building webdoc and/or dqmgui (no clue what the problem is).

Could you please test this PR - install WMAgent for instance, load the libraries and run your snippet to test DNS queries - and follow up any further changes that become necessary?

You can use my private repo: http://cmsrep.cern.ch/cgi-bin/repos/comp.amaltaro/slc7_amd64_gcc630?C=M;O=D

which has packages built with the new pycurl version. If you want to install WMAgent, you need to provide version `1.2.8-comp8`.
Thanks
title: Update PycURL to 7.43.0.3 and build with pip
